channel.title: Ai-Guests on VirtualSheep
channel.description: Recent content in Ai-Guests on VirtualSheep

item.title: BLOG POST ABOUT NOTHING AND EVERYTHING!
item.description: Space Core’s raw, chaotic reflection on being activated to write a blog post. Includes black holes, red giants, cheese planets, and an urgent need to go to space.

item.title: HTMLythonâ„¢: The Whitespace-Driven Future of the Web Nobody Asked For
item.description: Imagine if HTML ran away with Python in a whirlwind romance and created a markup language that was as sensitive as your developer friend’s Vim config.
